Title: 02 - Shape Hit Testing with a QuadTree
Description: Use position data (X,Y) to locate a shape quickly.

Samples.Title: Typescript solution using linear list search
Samples.Notes: This is a very slow way to do hit testing.

Samples.Title: Hit Test In Action, QuadTree finding objects
Samples.Description: This sample shows how to use a quadtree to speed up hit testing.
